channel.title: Stock Price on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Stock Price on FinanClub

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:291 Chances: Rivian stock has dropped around 50% to begin 2024, after surging to end 2023, and is now 80% below its IPO price of $78. Earlier this month, the electric-car maker Rivian announced its new SUV, the R2 â€” a $45,000 family hauler that will get more than 300 miles in range.

item.title: DAL
item.description: score:127 Chances: Delta Air Lines (DAL) has shown a positive change in stock price, reaching $43.44 at the latest trading day, indicating a 0.74% increase. The company is resuming flights to Israel, showing confidence in expanding its operations and capturing new markets. The appointment of Gil West, a former executive at Delta Air Lines, as the CEO of Hertz could bring valuable industry experience to lead the struggling rental car firm.

item.title: LBRT
item.description: score:47 Chances: The stock price of Liberty Energy Inc. (LBRT) is up by 14% this week, indicating positive momentum. The company announced full year and fourth quarter 2023 financial and operational results, suggesting potential growth and stability. The Board of Directors has increased its share repurchase authorization to $750 million, indicating confidence in the company’s future prospects.
